long_description: The Shimano XT FC-M780 10-speed crankset is specially designed for aggressive all-mountain riding. Hollowtech II technology maximizes stiffness and decreases weight. Steel/carbon composite middle ring adds rigidity for better shifting, increases service life and smoothly delivers power to the cassette. 42T - 32T - 24T chainrings create a close ratio gear combination. The Shimano XT FC-M780 10-speed crankset is designed to work with a 10-speed rear cassette.
short_description: The Shimano XT FC-M780 10-speed crankset is specially designed for aggressive all-mountain riding.
